variables.variable: import vtk import numpy file=vtk.vtkXMLUnstructuredGridReader() file.SetFileName("diff.vtu") file.Update() data=file.GetOutput() data.GetPointData().SetActiveScalars("phase1::PhaseVolumeFraction") d1=numpy.zeros(data.GetNumberOfPoints()) data.GetPointData().GetScalars().ExportToVoidPointer(d1) file2=vtk.vtkXMLUnstructuredGridReader() file2.SetFileName("serial.vtu") file2.Update() data2=file2.GetOutput() data2.GetPointData().SetActiveScalars("phase1::PhaseVolumeFraction") d2=numpy.zeros(data2.GetNumberOfPoints()) data2.GetPointData().GetScalars().ExportToVoidPointer(d2) check_P1DGP1=abs(d1/d2) print max(check_P1DGP1)
